Uniform Law:

DC CODE § 29-1008.18

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The discharge of the duties of a director or member of a committee of the board of directors shall be governed by the law applicable to directors of entities organized under Chapter 3 of this title; and
The liability of a director or member of a committee of the board of directors shall be governed by the law applicable to directors of entities organized under Chapter 3 of this title.
